name: Asuka Langley Soryu(EVA)
description:
This is a LORA model of EVA character Asuka Langley Soryu, base modle is sunshinemix.

Usage

These are my settings I always use it is recommended but not essential;

Steps: 20+

Sampler: DPM++ 2M Karras

CFG scale: 2 to 7

Size: 720*720
